meanings.definition: A person who endures hardship or suffering without giving up.
meanings.sent1: The endurers in the marathon showed great determination and strength.
meanings.sent2: We admire the endurers who face challenges with courage and resilience.
meanings.sent3: The group of endurers decided to tackle the mountain despite their fear of heights.
meanings.sent4: Like mighty oaks in a storm, the endurers stood firm in the face of adversity.
meanings.sent5: The image of the endurers crossing the finish line will forever inspire us.

meanings.definition: Those who persist through difficult circumstances.
meanings.sent1: Endurers like her never give up, no matter how tough things get.
meanings.sent2: The endurers in history books faced immense challenges but never wavered.
meanings.sent3: The endurers at the campfire kept telling jokes despite the pouring rain.
meanings.sent4: In the battlefield of life, the endurers are the true heroes.
meanings.sent5: The endurers' unwavering spirit shines brightest in the darkest times.

meanings.definition: The act of enduring or continuing in spite of challenges.
meanings.sent1: Endurership requires patience and a strong will to persevere.
meanings.sent2: The endurership of the explorers led them to discover new lands.
meanings.sent3: The endurership of the students during exams was truly commendable.
meanings.sent4: In the journey of life, endurership is the key to overcoming obstacles.
meanings.sent5: The endurership of the pioneers paved the way for future generations.
